text:
I'm very happy to have a partner
like AWS on our side
because on the one hand side
AWS is providing us with a very

powerful cloud ecosystem
with all the servers

that are needed today to implement
the solutions that we want to implement.

But what we want to do is we want to use
our domain knowledge that we have

built up over decades in all these
different domains that we are active in,

be it automotive, be it healthcare,
be it manufacturing, and then use

what AWS is providing our service
as the foundation to build upon.

With AWS, as we found the partner
that helps us to enable, educate,

re-skill, up-skill our employees
because this is crucial

if you want to go in this new software
business.

But with all these people that we have
that still need to learn a little bit more

in this new field of IT and digital
and with these events.

for example AWS a deeper reset
that we have today here in Stuttgart,

we even have ways to make this learning
a fun experience, which makes it easier

for people to get used to. What
helps a lot is running programs

like AWS Skills Guild
because this is a super mechanism,

super  vehicle to explain people
how the technology works.

So it helps me to focus on the higher
level tasks
that also for me are way more fulfilling.

And the best way in this program
is that what I'm hearing

from my colleagues is that they learn
and even have fun when learning.

and that's a good basis
to make them more open to embrace change.
